SELECT A.REQ_NO AS estNo , A.SEQ AS seq , C.APT_NAME AS aptName , D.imagePath AS itemImage , A.REQ_DATE estDt , A.REQ_CONTENTS reqContents , A.COMPANY_ID companyId , A.CATEGORY_ID categoryId , D.category_nm AS itemName , A.REQ_STATE reqState , (select cd_nm from wit_code000t where cd_cls = 'EST01' and appl_en_date = '99991231235959' and cd = A.REQ_STATE) AS stat , B.estimate_contents content , A.REQ_USER reqUser , IF(B.auto_yn = 'Y', '바로 견적서비스 발송', '일반 견적서비스 발송') AS autoYn , E.NAME AS prsnName , (SELECT category_nm FROM category WHERE category_id = A.category_id) AS categoryNm , B.estimate_amount itemPrice1 FROM request100t A, request110t B, apt000t C, category D, prsn000t E WHERE A.REQ_NO = B.REQ_NO AND A.SEQ = B.SEQ AND B.END_DATE = '99991231' AND A.company_id = #{sllrNo}
AND A.REQ_STATE != 01
AND A.REQ_STATE = 01
AND A.APT_NO = C.APT_NO AND A.CATEGORY_ID = D.CATEGORY_ID AND A.REQ_USER = E.CLERK_NO ORDER BY A.REQ_DATE DESC

SELECT A.REQ_NO estNo , C.APT_NAME AS aptName , D.imagePath AS itemImage , CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, A.REQ_DATE, NOW()) <= 10 THEN '방금 전' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, A.REQ_DATE, NOW()) < 60 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, A.REQ_DATE, NOW()), '초 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, A.REQ_DATE, NOW()) < 60 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, A.REQ_DATE, NOW()), '분 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, A.REQ_DATE, NOW()) < 24 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, A.REQ_DATE, NOW()), '시간 전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, est_dt, NOW()), '일 전') END AS estDt , A.REQ_CONTENTS reqContents , A.COMPANY_ID companyId , A.CATEGORY_ID categoryId , D.category_nm AS itemName , A.REQ_STATE reqState , (select cd_nm from wit_code000t where cd_cls = 'EST01' and appl_en_date = '99991231235959' and cd = A.REQ_STATE) AS stat , B.estimate_contents content , A.REQ_USER AS reqUser , IF(B.auto_yn = 'Y', '바로 견적서비스 발송', '일반 견적서비스 발송') AS autoYn , E.NAME AS prsnName , (SELECT category_nm FROM category WHERE category_id = A.category_id) AS categoryNm , B.estimate_amount itemPrice1 FROM request100t A, request110t B, apt000t C, category D, prsn000t E WHERE A.REQ_NO = B.REQ_NO AND A.SEQ = B.SEQ AND B.END_DATE = '99991231' AND A.company_id = #{sllrNo} AND A.REQ_STATE != 01 AND A.APT_NO = C.APT_NO AND A.CATEGORY_ID = D.CATEGORY_ID AND A.REQ_USER = E.CLERK_NO AND A.REQ_DATE BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK) AND NOW()

SELECT A.REQ_NO estNo , A.SEQ AS seq , C.APT_NAME AS aptName , D.imagePath AS itemImage , A.REQ_DATE estDt , A.REQ_CONTENTS reqContents , A.COMPANY_ID companyId , A.CATEGORY_ID categoryId , D.category_nm AS itemName , A.REQ_STATE reqState , (select cd_nm from wit_code000t where cd_cls = 'EST01' and appl_en_date = '99991231235959' and cd = A.REQ_STATE) AS stat , B.estimate_contents estimateContent , A.REQ_USER AS reqUser , E.NAME AS prsnName , (SELECT category_nm FROM category WHERE category_id = A.category_id) AS categoryNm , B.estimate_amount itemPrice1 , F.clerk_no AS sllrClerkNo FROM request100t A, request110t B, apt000t C, category D, prsn000t E, wit_sllr000t F WHERE A.REQ_NO = B.REQ_NO AND A.SEQ = B.SEQ AND B.END_DATE = '99991231' AND A.APT_NO = C.APT_NO AND A.CATEGORY_ID = D.CATEGORY_ID AND A.REQ_USER = E.CLERK_NO AND A.COMPANY_ID = F.SLLR_NO AND A.REQ_NO = #{estNo} AND A.SEQ = #{seq}

SELECT sllr_no AS sllrNo , store_name AS storeName , end_date AS endDate , service_area AS serviceArea , (SELECT CD_NM FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'AREA01' AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959' AND CD = service_area) serviceAreaNm , service_item AS serviceItem , (SELECT CATEGORY_NM FROM category a WHERE a.category_id = service_item) AS categoryNm , item_price1 AS itemPrice1 , sllr_content AS sllrContent , sllr_image AS sllrImage , name AS name , ceo_name AS ceoName , email AS email , store_code AS storeCode , store_image AS storeImage , hp AS hp , zip_code AS zipCode , address1 AS address1 , address2 AS address2 , (select count(req_no) from request100t where req_state = '01' and company_id = '17') AS reqCnt /* 견적요청내역 건수 */ , (select count(req_no) from request100t where req_state in ('02', '03', '04') and company_id = '17') AS ingCnt /* 거래내역 건수 */ , rate AS rate , clerk_no AS clerkNo , bord_no AS bordNo , bord_type AS bordType , OPEN_DATE AS openDate , AS_GBN AS asGbn , (SELECT CD_NM FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'AS01' AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959' AND CD = service_area) asGbnNm , BIZ_CERTIFICATION AS bizCertification , (SELECT CD_NM FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'BIZ01' AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959' AND CD = BIZ_CERTIFICATION) bizCertificationNm FROM wit_sllr000t WHERE SLLR_NO = #{sllrNo}

SELECT sllr_no AS sllrNo , store_name AS storeName , end_date AS endDate , service_area AS serviceArea , (SELECT CD_NM FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'AREA01' AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959' AND CD = service_area) serviceAreaNm , service_item AS serviceItem , (SELECT CATEGORY_NM FROM category a WHERE a.category_id = service_item) AS categoryNm , item_price1 AS itemPrice1 , sllr_content AS sllrContent , sllr_image AS sllrImage , name AS name , ceo_name AS ceoName , email AS email , store_code AS storeCode , store_image AS storeImage , hp AS hp , zip_code AS zipCode , address1 AS address1 , address2 AS address2 , (select count(req_no) from request100t where req_state = '01' and company_id = '17') AS reqCnt /* 견적요청내역 건수 */ , (select count(req_no) from request100t where req_state in ('02', '03', '04') and company_id = '17') AS ingCnt /* 거래내역 건수 */ , rate AS rate , clerk_no AS clerkNo , bord_no AS bordNo , bord_type AS bordType , OPEN_DATE AS openDate , AS_GBN AS asGbn , (SELECT CD_NM FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'AS01' AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959' AND CD = service_area) asGbnNm , BIZ_CERTIFICATION AS bizCertification , (SELECT CD_NM FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'BIZ01' AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959' AND CD = BIZ_CERTIFICATION) bizCertificationNm , CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, BIZ_CERTIFICATION_DATE, NOW()) <= 10 THEN '방금 전' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, BIZ_CERTIFICATION_DATE, NOW()) < 60 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, BIZ_CERTIFICATION_DATE, NOW()), '초 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, BIZ_CERTIFICATION_DATE, NOW()) < 60 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, BIZ_CERTIFICATION_DATE, NOW()), '분 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, BIZ_CERTIFICATION_DATE, NOW()) < 24 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, BIZ_CERTIFICATION_DATE, NOW()), '시간 전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, BIZ_CERTIFICATION_DATE, NOW()), '일 전') END AS bizCertificationDate FROM wit_sllr000t WHERE BIZ_CERTIFICATION IS NOT NULL
AND STORE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{storeName}, '%')
SELECT cash_no AS cashNo ,sllr_no AS sllrNo , cash AS cash , cre_dt AS creDt , cre_user AS creUser , upd_dt AS updDt , upd_user AS updUser FROM wit_cash000t WHERE SLLR_NO = #{sllrNo}

SELECT A.sllr_no AS sllrNo ,A.cash_no AS cashNo ,A.cash_seq AS cashSeq ,IF(A.cash_gbn = '01', '포인트충전', '견적서비스') AS cashGbn /* 01 : 포인트충전, 02 : 견적서비스 */ ,IF(A.cash_gbn = '01', A.cash, CONCAT('-', A.cash)) AS cash ,IF(A.cash_gbn = '01','포인트충전',(select item_name from wit_estm000t where est_no = A.EST_NO)) itemName ,A.cre_user AS creUser , CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, A.cre_dt, NOW()) <= 10 THEN '방금 전' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, A.cre_dt, NOW()) < 60 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, A.cre_dt, NOW()), '초 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, A.cre_dt, NOW()) < 60 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, A.cre_dt, NOW()), '분 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, A.cre_dt, NOW()) < 24 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, A.cre_dt, NOW()), '시간 전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, A.cre_dt, NOW()), '일 전') END AS creDt FROM wit_cash100t A WHERE A.SLLR_NO = #{sllrNo} ORDER BY cash_no, CAST(A.CASH_SEQ AS UNSIGNED) desc

select cash_recharge_no AS cashRechargeNo , cash_gbn AS cashGbn , end_date AS endDate , cash AS cash , bonus_ratio AS bonusRatio , (cash*bonus_ratio)/100 AS bonusCash , cash + (cash*bonus_ratio)/100 AS totalCash , recom_yn AS recomYn , popular_yn AS popularYn , cre_dt AS creDt , cre_user AS creUser , upd_dt AS updDt , upd_user AS updUser from wit_cash200t where cash_gbn = #{cashGbn} and end_date = '99991231'

SELECT A.ESDR_NO AS esdrNo , A.END_DATE AS endDate , A.SLLR_NO AS sllrNo , A.CATEGORY_ID AS categoryId , (SELECT CATEGORY_NM FROM category WHERE CATEGORY_ID = A.CATEGORY_ID) AS categoryNm , A.ESDR_SEND_CNT_CD AS esdrSendCntCd , (SELECT CD_NM FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'DRE01' AND CD = A.ESDR_SEND_CNT_CD AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959') esdrSendCnt , A.AREA AS area , A.CONTENT AS content , A.EX_START_TIME AS exStartTime , A.EX_END_TIME AS exEndtime , A.CRE_USER AS creUser , A.CRE_DATE AS creDate , A.UPD_USER AS updUser , A.UPD_DATE AS updDate , (SELECT COUNT(EST_NO) FROM wit_estm000t WHERE ESDR_NO = A.ESDR_NO AND DATE_FORMAT(EST_DT, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d')) todaySendCnt , CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(EST_NO) FROM wit_estm000t WHERE ESDR_NO = A.ESDR_NO AND DATE_FORMAT(EST_DT, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d')) != 0 THEN ((SELECT REM FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'DRE01' AND CD = A.ESDR_SEND_CNT_CD AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959') / (SELECT cd_nm FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'DRE01' AND CD = A.ESDR_SEND_CNT_CD AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959')) * (SELECT COUNT(EST_NO) FROM wit_estm000t WHERE ESDR_NO = A.ESDR_NO AND DATE_FORMAT(EST_DT, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d')) ELSE 0 END AS todaySendCash FROM estm100t A WHERE A.SLLR_NO = #{sllrNo} AND A.END_DATE = '99991231' order by A.esdr_no

SELECT A.ESDR_NO AS esdrNo , A.END_DATE AS endDate , A.SLLR_NO AS sllrNo , A.CATEGORY_ID AS categoryId , (SELECT CATEGORY_NM FROM category WHERE CATEGORY_ID = A.CATEGORY_ID) AS categoryNm , A.ESDR_SEND_CNT_CD AS esdrSendCntCd , (SELECT CD_NM FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'DRE01' AND CD = A.ESDR_SEND_CNT_CD AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959') esdrSendCnt , A.AREA AS area , A.CONTENT AS content , A.EX_START_TIME AS exStartTime , A.EX_END_TIME AS exEndTime , A.CRE_USER AS creUser , A.CRE_DATE AS creDate , A.UPD_USER AS updUser , A.UPD_DATE AS updDate FROM estm100t A WHERE A.ESDR_NO = #{esdrNo} AND A.END_DATE = '99991231'
